abstract: Soccer Roundup; Barcelona is set to play Bayern Munich in Champions League semifinals; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Bayern Coach Pep Guardiola will take on Barcelona, his former club, in the semifinals for the first time, while the defending champion Madrid faces Juventus.

headline.main: It’s Barcelona vs. Bayern Munich and Juventus vs. Real Madrid in the Champions League
headline.print_headline: Two Reunions in Champions League Draw

snippet: Bayern Coach Pep Guardiola will take on Barcelona, his former club, in the semifinals for the first time, while the defending champion Madrid faces Juventus.
